DOC.brief_summary: Despite the importance of breast milk for sick or preterm neonates, there is currently no consensus regarding the use of raw mother's own milk (MOM) in neonatal units. The aims of this study are to: (a) describe factors associated with the use of raw MOM; (b) investigate the association between early use of raw MOM and breastfeeding continuation at discharge and up to 6 months later.
DOC.brief_title: Using Mother's Raw Milk Could Improve Breastfeeding in Hospitalized Neonates
DOC.criteria: Admitted neonates between April 2012 and June 2013 are eligible if they are intended to be breastfeed and hospitalized â‰¥7 days Neonates with parents not fluent in French.
